Loyal Unto Death.name: Loyal Unto Death
Loyal Unto Death.fullText:
Malec-Keth Janissary Attack 11Loyal Unto Death

In a flash of light, you and a nearby ally vanish, reappearing only after you have switched positions.

Encounter        Arcane, Teleportation, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Effect: Before the attack, you and an ally within 10 squares of you swap places, teleporting into each other’s space. Each enemy adjacent to you grants combat advantage to you, and each enemy adjacent to the ally grants combat advantage to him or her until the end of your next turn.

  Secondary Target: One enemy

  Attack: Intelligence vs. AC

  Hit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.


Revision (1/29/2010)
In the Attack and Hit lines, replace “Strength” with “Intelligence.” The power should be attacking with Intelligence, since that is a swordmage’s primary ability score.

Published in Manual of the Planes, page(s) 144.
Loyal Unto Death.flavor: In a flash of light, you and a nearby ally vanish, reappearing only after you have switched positions.

  Attack: Intelligence vs. AC

  Hit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

Each enemy adjacent to you grants combat advantage to you, and each enemy adjacent to the ally grants combat advantage to him or her until the end of your next turn.

Ever-Present Escort.name: Ever-Present Escort
Ever-Present Escort.fullText:
Malec-Keth Janissary Utility 12Ever-Present Escort

You extend the invisible field of protection granted by your swordmage warding to a nearby ally.

Encounter        Arcane, Teleportation
Immediate Interrupt      Close burst 5

Trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is hit by an attack that targets AC

Target: The triggering ally in the burst

Effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the target. The target gains a +4 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.


Published in Manual of the Planes, page(s) 144.

Elemental Scourge.name: Elemental Scourge
Elemental Scourge.fullText:
Malec-Keth Janissary Attack 20Elemental Scourge

You draw forth a burst of energy from the Elemental Chaos, scouring your enemies while allowing your allies to retreat to safety.

Daily        Arcane, Cold, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Teleportation, Thunder
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d8 + Constitution modifier cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage. The attack ignores any resistance to these damage types.

Effect: Each ally in the burst can teleport 3 squares.


Published in Manual of the Planes, page(s) 144.
